description: A film record of the 1968 Summer Research Institute of Screen Study, a joint project of the National Film Board and McGill University. Thirty teachers from across Canada attending a six-week course in film production and analysis are observed by a documentary film crew. Many of their discussions centre on the impact of technology and media on the individual and the environment.
